properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_MISSING ( MISSING_NO , MISSING_WRITER , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , PNAME , GENDER , MI_DATE , AGE_FROM , AGE_TO , LOCATION , FEATURE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MISSNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 3 , SEQ_MISSNO.CURRVAL , ? )
UPDATE TB_MISSING SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE MISSING_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MISSING_NO , MISSING_WRITER , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , PNAME , GENDER , MI_DATE , AGE_FROM , LOCATION , FEATURE , (SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = MI.MISSING_NO AND REF_BOARD_NO = 3 AND ROWNUM = 1) "TITLEIMG" FROM TB_MISSING MI WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MISSING_NO DESC

SELECT MISSING_NO , NICKNAME , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , PNAME , GENDER , MI_DATE , AGE_FROM , AGE_TO , LOCATION , FEATURE , COUNT , ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_MISSING JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MISSING_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE MISSING_NO = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BOARD_NO = 3 AND REF_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MISSING SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MISSING_NO = ?
